feed.title: IMPULSE: Instant Payments using the Bitcoin protocol

entry.title: IMPULSE: Instant Payments using the Bitcoin protocol
entry.summary: On January 17th, 2015 at 8:45 PM, Rune Kj√¶r Svendsen sent a message to a list expressing his concern about the lack of discussion around potentially privacy-hostile products. He shared a link to a product called Impulse, which he found on Reddit, and included a PDF file for further information. He asked the list members for their thoughts on the matter. The product in question, Impulse, is not described in detail but appears to be related to online privacy. The lack of response to Svendsen's message suggests that there may be a reluctance among some to discuss or acknowledge privacy concerns. In an effort to promote online privacy, Svendsen included a link to a YouTube video that provides instructions on email encryption.
